tooltip.sakuratinker.blood_bound_steel.l: It is advised not to move recklessly.
tooltip.sakuratinker.south_star.line1: Drifting through darkness for millennia, only to meet you.
tooltip.sakuratinker.soul_sakura.line1: Who wouldn't love a big fluffy tail?
tooltip.sakuratinker.nihilite_ingot.line: This ingot has absorbed too many souls...
item.sakuratinker.embedded_armor.descrip: Embedded Armor is specialized for defense but offers very limited ability slots.
item.sakuratinker.vampire_knife.descript: A melee projectile weapon. Throws life-stealing daggers.
item.sakuratinker.great_sword.descriptio: A heavy weapon that delivers crushing blows.
item.sakuratinker.swift_sword.descriptio: A precision weapon capable of piercing armor.
item.sakuratinker.laser_gun.description: A melee weapon that fires lasers, consuming energy.
item.sakuratinker.shuriken.description: A fast, low-damage projectile with moderate range.
item.sakuratinker.grappling_hook.descrip: A long-range projectile weapon that launches a hook to pull the target 2 blocks forward, dealing damage during the pull.
item.sakuratinker.power_bank.description: Provides charge for your rechargeable tools with multiple charging modes.
item.sakuratinker.battle_flag.descriptio: Support weapon that applies debuffs to enemies and buffs to allies.
item.sakuratinker.first_fractal.descript: A melee weapon that, when swung, spawns a Phantom Sword at the block the pointer points at.
item.sakuratinker.fox_mask.description: An accessory that can change appearance.
tool_stat.sakuratinker.movement_speed.de: Increases movement speed by this value.
tool_stat.sakuratinker.armor.description: Increases armor points by this value.
tool_stat.sakuratinker.armor_toughness.d: Increases armor toughness by this value.
tool_stat.sakuratinker.damage.descriptio: Increases attack damage by this value.
tool_stat.sakuratinker.arrow_damage.desc: Increases arrow damage by this value.
tool_stat.sakuratinker.attack_speed.desc: Increases attack speed by this value.
tool_stat.sakuratinker.energy_storage.de: Increases energy storage by this value.
tool_stat.sakuratinker.spell_power.descr: Increases spell power by this value.
tool_stat.sakuratinker.spell_reduce.desc: Reduces mana cost by this value.
tool_stat.sakuratinker.cast_time.descrip: Reduces spell cooldown by this value.
tool_stat.sakuratinker.phantom_amount.de: Maximum number of phantom swords generated.
modifier.sakuratinker.relentless.descrip: Attacks ignore 30% of the target's invincibility frames.
modifier.sakuratinker.counter_attack.des: Attacks deal an additional instance of damage equal to the original hit.
modifier.sakuratinker.solid.flavor: Your armor's durability, defense, and toughness are enhanced
modifier.sakuratinker.solid.description: Each level increases armor toughness and knockback resistance by 1, and durability by 10%
modifier.sakuratinker.void.description: Deals additional void damage on attack
modifier.sakuratinker.wither_symbiosis.f: The power of wither dwells within
modifier.sakuratinker.wither_symbiosis.d:
Your attacks inflict wither effect and deal extra damage to withered targets.
Do not become too greedy for wither's power
modifier.sakuratinker.ruination.descript: Attacks with this tool deal extra damage based on the target's current health
modifier.sakuratinker.eternity.descripti: Never reach the truth of death
modifier.sakuratinker.null_almighty.flav: All things end, all things permitted
modifier.sakuratinker.null_almighty.desc: This armor reduces all damage by 25%.
modifier.sakuratinker.youkaified.descrip: If youkai-fied, grants some positive effects.
modifier.sakuratinker.mortal_wound.descr: This weapon weakens the target's healing for a duration.
modifier.sakuratinker.magician.descripti: Increases chant cooldown and spell cooldown reduction.
modifier.sakuratinker.kobold.description: When your health is greater than 40, you gain 10% damage per level and regenerate health
modifier.sakuratinker.storm_veil.descrip: After not taking damage for 30 seconds, gain Resistance IV for 3 seconds.
modifier.sakuratinker.rootedness.descrip: Gain 10% of the Invincible Frame for 15% of the damage taken, up to a maximum of level 8.
modifier.sakuratinker.nether_ghost.descr: Killing enemies restores hunger. If hunger is full, restores health.
modifier.sakuratinker.omnipotence.descri: You shall dictate the end of life.
modifier.sakuratinker.clear_strike.descr: Backstabs deal 0.5x more damage. If unconscious, deals additional damage.
modifier.sakuratinker.guardian_shell.des: Grants positive effects when near death.
modifier.sakuratinker.body_impact.descri: Attacks have a 10% chance to add damage equal to your armor value.
modifier.sakuratinker.spectral.descripti: This armor grants the wearer an 8% (per level +2%) chance to evade damage.
modifier.sakuratinker.danmaku_ball.flavo: What kind of power is this?!
modifier.sakuratinker.danmaku_ball.descr: Swinging the weapon releases danmaku attacks
modifier.sakuratinker.fountain_magic.des: Increases max mana and mana regeneration
Like an extension of your arm!
Spells manifest fully in your hands. Each level increases frost, fiery, lightning, nature, and holy spell power by 10%.
modifier.sakuratinker.twilight_sparkle.d: When not in the Twilight Forest dimension, increases damage by 8% per level.
modifier.sakuratinker.twilight_remembran: Attacks deal 10% (per level +10%) damage to surrounding enemies.
modifier.sakuratinker.armor_twilight_rem: Grants Night Vision and Fire Resistance. When hit, has a 10% chance to reduce damage to 2.
modifier.sakuratinker.dissloving.flavor: I don't care about lost XP.
modifier.sakuratinker.dissloving.descrip: Using the tool may drop XP between 0-4x the original amount.
modifier.sakuratinker.energy_infusion.de: Tools consume energy first. If energy is insufficient, consumes durability.
modifier.sakuratinker.ether_protect.desc: When health drops below 40%, generates a strong shield that reflects most projectiles, provides 50% damage resistance, and knocks back attackers.
modifier.sakuratinker.neutron_condense.d: Tools last longer, and your weapons siphon enemy power (max 50 stacks).
modifier.sakuratinker.absorption.descrip: Gains 10% max health as temporary health every 10 seconds, up to per-level max health.
modifier.sakuratinker.jinx_doll.descript: When afflicted with a debuff, removes it and grants a random buff.
modifier.sakuratinker.colorization.descr: Each point of armor grants 1% evasion chance, up to 80%.
modifier.sakuratinker.pain_resonance.des: Attacks inflict debuffs and increase damage based on the number of debuffs (30% per debuff).
modifier.sakuratinker.heavy.description: Inflicts Slowness. Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 10% of your armor value.
modifier.sakuratinker.soul_bound_curio.d: Your accessories won't drop on death.
modifier.sakuratinker.mamba.description: Grants flight when health is above half. If below half, increases gravity.
modifier.sakuratinker.dwarven_curio.desc: Increases mining speed and initial speed at low altitudes. Gains +6 mining speed or +0.05 initial speed per 64 blocks below sea level.
modifier.sakuratinker.magnetic_curio.des: Attracts items within 3 blocks of the player.
modifier.sakuratinker.light_weight_curio: Increases mining speed and movement speed by 7% per level.
modifier.sakuratinker.world_bottom.descr: Increases damage by 1% per 5 blocks of Y-axis height.
modifier.sakuratinker.high_frequency_bar: Each hit reduces damage taken, up to 50%
modifier.sakuratinker.torturing.flavor: It's advised not to move recklessly
modifier.sakuratinker.torturing.descript: Every 10 attacks inflict 1 level of Torture, up to 50 levels.
modifier.sakuratinker.crystalline.descri: Tools deal bonus damage based on current durability relative to max durability, up to 20% at full durability.
Armor reduces damage based on current durability relative to max durability, up to 30% at full durability.
modifier.sakuratinker.reapers_blessing.d: Grants damage bonus based on missing health.
modifier.sakuratinker.dragon_martyr.flav: Don't worry, the cart is ready
modifier.sakuratinker.dragon_martyr.desc: Each level increases damage to fire, ice, and lightning dragons by 20%.
Each level reduces damage from fire, ice, and lightning dragons by 10%.
modifier.sakuratinker.fiery_fire.descrip: Attacks set enemies on fire. If the enemy is already on fire, each level increases attack damage by 5 and arrow damage by 1.5.
modifier.sakuratinker.fire_immunity.desc: Immune to being set on fire.
modifier.sakuratinker.lightning_immunity: Immune to lightning damage and restores health equal to 20% of the damage taken.
modifier.sakuratinker.chain_lightning.de: Attacks generate chain lightning dealing 20% of the damage.
modifier.sakuratinker.dragon_soul.descri: Each level increases durability by 500, armor by 3, and toughness by 2.
modifier.sakuratinker.battery_cell.descr: Allows tools to consume energy for additional attack modes.
modifier.sakuratinker.soul_devourer.flav: I hear... the screams of souls
modifier.sakuratinker.soul_devourer.desc: Increases your damage by 0.01% for each enemy killed.
modifier.sakuratinker.shielding.descript: Increases armor value and toughness by 10% per level.
modifier.sakuratinker.insatiable_curio.f: First taste of truth, boundless desire!
modifier.sakuratinker.insatiable_curio.d: Attack damage progressively increases during continuous combat.
modifier.sakuratinker.golem_heart.descri: When armor value is below 10 points, gain most effects of Golem Heart. Multiple equipped items incur penalties.
modifier.sakuratinker.blazing_core.descr: Gain most effects of Blazing Core, with 10 seconds of lava immunity.
modifier.sakuratinker.angel_blessing.des: Gain most effects of Angel's Blessing: immunity to fall and collision damage, launched projectiles receive acceleration.
modifier.sakuratinker.will_of_ocean.desc: Gain most effects of Ocean's Will: 40% damage reduction, underwater breathing and night vision, gravity immunity.
modifier.sakuratinker.void_pearl.descrip: Gain most effects of Void Pearl: no need to breathe, immunity to all status effects. Any creatures exposed to darkness near you will suffer massive damage and severe debuffs (ignores armor). Flying creatures are affected regardless of sky light level.
modifier.sakuratinker.magic_shield.descr: Every 10 points of magic can block 1 point of damage, up to a maximum of 12% damage reduction (up to Level 5).
modifier.sakuratinker.arrow_ammo.descrip: Tools can use Tinker Arrows as ammunition.
modifier.sakuratinker.enchanted_blade.fl: My blade... is tempered with magic.
modifier.sakuratinker.enchanted_blade.de: Consumes 5 mana per attack to gain +1 damage, up to 80 mana. Each level increases the max mana limit by 20.
modifier.sakuratinker.essence_earth.desc: Increases damage based on the ratio of the enemy's max HP to yours, up to 10x.
modifier.sakuratinker.heavy_weight.descr: Launches targets into the air based on damage dealt and applies a gravitational pull effect.
modifier.sakuratinker.arcane_tinkering.f: I have deciphered the secrets of runes.
modifier.sakuratinker.arcane_tinkering.d: The perfect fusion of craftsmanship and magic!
modifier.sakuratinker.magic_blade.descri: If the attack is blocked, deal the same amount of magic damage to the target.
modifier.sakuratinker.spell_power.descri: Increases spell power by 10% per level.
modifier.sakuratinker.solar_burning.desc: Converts damage into solar burn damage.
modifier.sakuratinker.rejuvenating.flavo: What you hold in your hand is a traitor!
modifier.sakuratinker.rejuvenating.descr: Restores health to the target upon hitting.
modifier.sakuratinker.feather.descriptio: Reduces initial speed by 1 per level, and increases accuracy by 1.
modifier.sakuratinker.seal_tooltip.flavo: The input component must be part of the tool
modifier.sakuratinker.hydra_will.descrip: When dying, become immune to death, restore 20% max HP and gain 3 seconds of invulnerability. Cooldown: 120s
modifier.sakuratinker.energy_surge.descr: Doubles energy transfer efficiency per level.
modifier.sakuratinker.polishing.descript: Each polish point increases damage by 1%. Base damage at 0 polish is 60%. Consumes 10 polish points per second from repair materials.
modifier.sakuratinker.life_ratio.descrip: Increases damage based on ratio of target's max HP to your max HP. Higher ratios grant greater bonuses. Current multiplier: %s
modifier.sakuratinker.attack_modifier.de: Battle Standard exclusive: Extends duration of negative effects applied by the standard.
modifier.sakuratinker.defence_modifier.d: Battle Standard exclusive: Extends duration of positive effects applied by the standard.
modifier.sakuratinker.botany_is_tech.fla: As everyone knows, it's a tech mod.
modifier.sakuratinker.botany_is_tech.des: Restores 500 energy for every 200 mana consumed.
modifier.sakuratinker.strengthen_decompo: Doubles the saturation gained from food.
modifier.sakuratinker.fungal_parasites.d: Applies the fungal parasite effect on hit.
modifier.sakuratinker.coagulation.descri: 30% chance (up to 90%) to not consume slime coating.
modifier.sakuratinker.danger_sense.descr: Senses mobs within 10 blocks (increased by 10 per level), applies Glowing to hostile mobs and grants Strength and Speed to self.
modifier.sakuratinker.incomplete_transfo: A perfect being born of imperfection.
Increases max slime coating by 1000 per level and restores 10% of max slime coating every 5 seconds per level.
modifier.sakuratinker.mucilaginous_shell: Each point of slime coating blocks 1 point of damage.
modifier.sakuratinker.fusion_burn.descri: Applies Fusion Burn on hit. Increases effect level if already applied.
modifier.sakuratinker.god_of_slime.flavo: A deity forged from the lowest creatures...
modifier.sakuratinker.god_of_slime.descr: Increases damage by 50% of current slime coating per level.
modifier.sakuratinker.mind.description: Increases all stats by 1.5× per level, with bonuses tailored to the tool type.
modifier.sakuratinker.body.description: Uses mana to restore durability. Can consume 200,000 mana to fully repair a broken tool.
modifier.sakuratinker.soul.description: Grants additional upgrade slots equal to 2× level, depending on the tool type.
modifier.sakuratinker.shitakuso.flavor: The weak shall rise against the strong
modifier.sakuratinker.shitakuso.descript: Deals bonus damage based on the ratio between the wielder's and the target's max health.
modifier.sakuratinker.dreadful_scythe.de: Swing your weapon to unleash a dreadful scythe projectile.
modifier.sakuratinker.fear.description: Grants immunity to magic and wither damage. Enemies that attack you have a chance to be slowed. Doubles your health regeneration.
modifier.sakuratinker.devour_soul.descri: Restores soul energy upon killing mobs.
modifier.sakuratinker.soul_intake.descri: Consumes soul energy to repair the tool.
modifier.sakuratinker.soul_seeker.descri: Reduces soul energy consumption by 4% per level.
modifier.sakuratinker.exceptionally_tale: Doubles the number of modifier slots on the tool.
modifier.sakuratinker.soul_erosion.descr: Attacks inflict Erosion on enemies, reducing their defenses.
modifier.sakuratinker.mana_ray.descripti: Swinging the weapon fires a mana ray.
modifier.sakuratinker.pixie.description: 5% chance to summon a pixie on hit, +5% per level.
modifier.sakuratinker.terra_magical.desc: Heals 1 HP × level every 2 seconds, restores 2 mana × level per tick.
modifier.sakuratinker.natural_will.flavo: The power of nature can calm even the restless Nether creatures
modifier.sakuratinker.gaia_wrath.descrip: Each attack deals 3% × level of the target's max HP as damage.
modifier.sakuratinker.gaia_soul.descript: Attacks deal an extra 10% magic, lightning, frost, fire, fall, and drowning damage.
modifier.sakuratinker.gaia_guardian.flav: The power of plants protects you
modifier.sakuratinker.gaia_guardian.desc: Consumes 100 mana × level to block 1 damage, up to 50 × level damage blocked.
death.attack.overload_damage_type.item: %1$s was killed by overload energy from %2$s's %3$s.
